name: Trine
summary:
【游戏介绍】 

    本游戏为奇幻动作冒险风格，玩家在游戏中可体验盗贼、法师、战士3种职业，陪同他们一起打击亡灵族，每个职业都有不同重点技能，玩家在游戏中可以展现灵活的动作，解决难题，以便克服关卡来拯救王国。

【配置要求】 

Minimum System Requirements:：
    * English version of Microsoft(r) Windows(r) 2000/WinNT/XP/Vista
    * Pentium(r) 4 2.0 GHz or Athlon(tm) XP 2000+ processor
    * 256MB RAM
    * 1 GB of uncompressed free hard disk space
    * 100% DirectX(r) 9.0 compatible 16-bit sound card and latest drivers
    * 100% Windows(r) 2000/XP compatible mouse, keyboard and latest drivers
    * DirectX(r) 9.0 (included)
    * 3D hardware Accelerator Card Required - 100% DirectX(r) 9.0 compatible Hardware Accelerated video card and latest drivers
